text:
e="preserve">Lutfiye Selva Cam (born in 5, September, 1970, in urfa, Turkey) She is a Turkish engineer and politician.
She is a deputy in the Justice and Development Party for Ankara since  2015.
Biography.
She studied at Middle East Technical University, College of Engineering, Department of Chemical Engineering.
in June 2015 and November 2015 general elections, the Justice and Development Party entered Parliament as an Ankara
she is mother of three children. Fluent in English, French and Arabic medium.
